data.caption: Intimation Of Resignation And Appointment Of Chief Financial Officer Of The Company.
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 30 of SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015 and in accordance with the requirements of sub-clause 7 of Para A of Part A of Schedule III of SEBI (LODR), Regulations, 2015, we wish to inform you that Mr. Srigopal Choudhary, the Resolution Professional of the Company vide his email dated 23rd July, 2021 has informed to the management of the Company that Mr. Sanatan Dash has resigned from the post of Senior Advisor-Acting Chief Financial Officer (CFO) of the Company and he will be relived from his duties w.e.f. 19th August, 2021 and Mr. Subrat Kumar Panda is designated as Acting Chief Financial Officer (CFO) w.e.f. 24th July, 2021 and he will be appointed as Acting Chief Financial Officer (CFO) of the Company w.e.f. 19th August, 2021 and the particulars for appointment of Mr. Subrat Kumar Panda as Acting Chief Financial Officer (CFO) of the Company.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Resignation of Chief Financial Officer (CFO)
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 30 of SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015 and in accordance with the requirements of sub-clause 7 of Para A of Part A of Schedule III of SEBI (LODR), Regulations, 2015, we wish to inform you that Mr. Srigopal Choudhary, the Resolution Professional of the Company vide his email dated 23rd July, 2021 has informed to the management of the Company that Mr. Sanatan Dash has resigned from the post of Senior Advisor-Acting Chief Financial Officer (CFO) of the Company and he will be relived from his duties w.e.f. 19th August, 2021 and Mr. Subrat Kumar Panda is designated as Acting Chief Financial Officer (CFO) w.e.f. 24th July, 2021 and he will be appointed as Acting Chief Financial Officer (CFO) of the Company w.e.f. 19th August, 2021 and the particulars for appointment of Mr. Subrat Kumar Panda as Acting Chief Financial Officer (CFO) of the Company.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Cessation
data.news_body: It is hereby informed you that Mr. Bibhu Prasad Mohapatra who was appointed as Chief Executive Officer (CEO) of the Company with effect from 1st May, 2021 has ceased CEO of the Company with effect from the close of business hours of 31.05.2021.

data.caption: Regulation 30 Of SEBI (Listing Obligations And Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015-Intimation Of Cessation And Appointment Of Chief Executive Officer (CEO) Of The Company
data.news_body:
Pursuant to Regulation 30 of SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015 and in accordance with the requirements of sub-clause 7 of Para A of Part A of Schedule III of SEBI (LODR), Regulations, 2015, we wish to inform you that Mr. Srigopal Choudhary, the Resolution Professional of the Company vide his email has appointed Mr. Biswajit Mohanty as Chief Executive Officer (CEO) of the Company w.e.f. 01 June, 2021.
It is further informed you that Mr. Bibhu Prasad Mohapatra who was appointed as Chief Executive Officer (CEO) of the Company with effect from 1st May, 2021 has ceased CEO of the Company with effect from the close of business hours of 31.05.2021.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Cessation
data.news_body:
Pursuant to Regulation 30 of SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015 and in accordance with the requirements of sub-clause 7 of Para A of Part A of Schedule III of SEBI (LODR), Regulations, 2015, we wish to inform you that Mr. Srigopal Choudhary, the Resolution Professional of the Company vide his email dated 01 May, 2021 has appointed Mr. Bibhu Prasad Mohapatra as Chief Executive Officer (CEO) of the Company w.e.f. 01 May, 2021 and further informed you that Mr. Bidu Bhusan Dash has been relieved from the additional charge of the Chief Financial Officer (CFO) w.e.f. 01 May, 2021, and Mr. Sanatan Dash has been appointed as the Chief Financial Officer (CFO) of the Company w.e.f. 01 May, 2021.

The Details required under Regulation 30 of the Listing Regulations read with SEBI Circular No. CIR/CFD/CMD/4/2015 dated 9th September, 2015 is given in the enclosed Annexure-1 and Annexure-2.

You are requested to take the above information on record.

data.caption: Announcement Sub-Clause 7 Of Para A Of Part A Of Schedule III Of Regulation 30 Of SEBI (Listing Obligations And Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015
data.news_body:
Pursuant to Regulation 30 of SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, we wish to inform you that Mr. Srigopal Choudhary, the Resolution Professional of the Company vide his email dated 01 May, 2021 has appointed Mr. Bibhu Prasad Mohapatra as Chief Executive Officer (CEO) of the Company w.e.f. 01 May, 2021 and the particulars for appointment of Mr. Bibhu Prasad Mohapatra as Chief Executive Officer (CEO) of the Company is enclosed as Annexure-1.

It is further informed you that Mr. Bidu Bhusan Dash has been relieved from the additional charge of the Chief Financial Officer (CFO) w.e.f. 01 May, 2021, and Mr. Sanatan Dash has been appointed as the Chief Financial Officer (CFO) of the Company w.e.f. 01 May, 2021 and the particulars for appointment of Mr. Sanatan Dash as Chief Financial Officer (CFO) of the Company is enclosed as Annexure-2.

You are requested to take the above information on record.

data.descriptor: Funds raising by issuance of Debt Securities by Large Entities
data.caption: Format of Initial Disclosure to be made by an entity identified as a Large Corporate
data.news_body:
Format of Initial Disclosure to be made by an entity identified as a Large Corporate.

Sr. No. Particulars Details
1Name of CompayOrtel Communications Ltd
2CINL74899DL1995PLC069353
3 Outstanding borrowing of company as on 31st March / 31st December, as applicable (in Rs cr) 229.22
4Highest Credit Rating during the previous FY D
4aName of the Credit Rating Agency issuing the Credit Rating mentioned in (4)CARE RATINGS LIMITED
5Name of Stock Exchange# in which the fine shall be paid, in case of shortfall in the required borrowing under the frameworkBSE


We confirm that we are a Large Corporate as per the applicability criteria given under the SEBI circular SEBI/HO/DDHS/CIR/P/2018/144 dated November 26, 2018. No



Name of the Company Secretary: Bidu Bhusan Dash
Designation: Company Secretary
EmailId: bidu.dash@ortelgroup.com
Name of the Chief Financial Officer: Bidu Bhusan Dash
Designation: Chief Financial Officer
EmailId: bidu.dash@ortelgroup.com

Date: 25/04/2021

Note: In terms para of 3.2(ii) of the circular, beginning F.Y 2022, in the event of shortfall in the mandatory borrowing through debt securities, a fine of 0.2% of the shortfall shall be levied by Stock Exchanges at the end of the two-year block period. Therefore, an entity identified as LC shall provide, in its initial disclosure for a financial year, the name of Stock Exchange to which it would pay the fine in case of shortfall in the mandatory borrowing through debt markets.

data.caption: Disclosure Under Regulation 31(A)
data.news_body: Pursuant to the Scheme of Demerger which is becoming effective on 30th November 2020, the Raila Investment Undertaking of  Raila inter alia comprising of 25,80,441 (Twenty-five Lacs Eighty Thousand Four Hundred Forty-one Eight) equity shares owned and held in Ortel Communications Limited have been transferred to and vested in favor of UMSL and immediately thereafter the UMSL Investment Undertaking of  UMSL inter alia comprising of 25,80,441 (Twenty-five Lacs Eighty Thousand Four Hundred Forty-one Eight) equity shares owned and held in Ortel Communications Limited have been transferred to and vested in favor of BP Developers Private Ltd.

data.caption: Reg. 34 (1) Annual Report
data.news_body:
Dear Sir/Madam;

SUBJECT: ANNUAL REPORT CLARIFICATION

With reference to the above we hereby state that due to some last minute changes at the time of handed over the final documents to printer, the page has been missed out by the printer in the PDF Annual Report Copy only which we shared with the Stock Exchanges. We hereby attached the revised PDF copy of annual report for your reference. However, we have already intimated to the printer concerned for checking thoroughly before printing in next time and we would exercise caution in future to avoid recurrence of such instances. Please take the same into records and obliged.

The copy of Revised Annual Report 2019-20 are also available on the Company's website http://www.ortelcom.com and on the website of BSE Limited at https://www.bseindia.com, website of National Stock Exchange India Limited at https://www.nseindia.com.

data.caption: Closure of Trading Window
data.news_body: Pursuant to SEBI (Prohibition of Insider Trading) Regulations, 2015 as amended by SEBI (Prohibition of Insider Trading) (Amendment) Regulations, 2018 and in accordance with the Code of Conduct to Regulate, Monitor, the Company, the trading window has already been closed with effect from 1st October 2020 pursuant to SEBI (Prohibition of Insider Trading) Regulations, 2015 for the Resolution Professional, all the Directors, Key Managerial Persons, Designated Persons and the Connected Persons covered under the said regulations and shall remain closed till end of 48 hours after the results are made public i.e. November 15, 2020 for the purpose of declaration of unaudited financial results.

data.caption: Board Meeting Intimation for Consideration And Take On Record Of Unaudited Financial Results (Standalone And Consolidated) Of The Company For The Quarter And Half Year Ended 30Th September 2020 Along With Other Agenda Items On Friday, 13Th November, 2020.
data.news_body: Ortel Communications Ltdhas informed BSE that the meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company is scheduled on 13/11/2020 ,inter alia, to consider and approve In view of Regulation 29 of Securities & Exchange Board of India (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, this is to inform you that the Unaudited Financial Results (Standalone and Consolidated) of the Company for the quarter and half year ended 30th September 2020 will be considered and take on record along with other agenda items on Friday, 13th November 2020.

data.caption: Closure of Trading Window
data.news_body: This is to inform you that as per the Company''s Code of Internal Procedures and Conduct for Prohibition of Insider Trading in Securities (Company''s Insider Trading Code), in connection with the Unaudited Financial Results for second quarter of financial year 2020-21 and half year ended on September 30, 2020 (hereinafter referred to as Unaudited Financial Results), the Trading Window for dealing in the Equity Shares of the Company shall remain closed for the Resolution Professional, all Directors, Key Managerial Persons, Designated Persons and Connected Persons of the Company from October 1, 2020 and the same shall remain closed until 48 hours after the announcement of Unaudited Financial Results. The date of Meeting of the Resolution Professional of the Company for review and approval of the Financial Results for the quarter and half year ending 30.09.2020 will be intimated In due course.

data.caption: Intimation Of Appointment Of Internal Auditor, Cost Auditor And Secretarial Auditor For FY 2020-21
data.news_body:
With reference to the above subject and in pursuant to Regulation 30 of Securities and Exchange Board of India (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements), 2015, we hereby inform you that the Resolution Professional in its meeting held on Friday, 31st July, 2020 has approved the following:

1. Appointment of M/s SCM Associates, Chartered Accountants,98, Kharavel Nagar, Bhubaneswar, Odisha as Internal Auditor of the Company for FY 2020-21

2. Appointment of M/s NIRAN & CO., Cost Accountants, ESEN DEN, 475, Aiginia, Asiana Plaza Entry, Khandagiri, Bhubaneswar - 751019,Odisha as Cost Auditor of the Company for FY 2020-21

3. Appointment of Mr. Suresh Kumar Yadav of M/s Kumar Suresh & Associates, Company Secretaries, 1078/31 Street No-1, Laxman Vihar, Phase-1,Gurgoan-122002 as Secretarial Auditor of the Company for FY 2020-21

data.caption: Outcome Of Meeting Of Resolution Professional Dated July 31, 2020
data.news_body: The Resolution Professional of the Company at the meeting held on 31st July 2020, inter-alia have approved the audited Financial Results (Standalone & Consolidated) for the quarter and year ended 31st March,2020. A copy of the Audited Financial Results (Standalone and Consolidated)for the quarter and year ended March 31, 2020 and Report of Statutory Auditors are enclosed.
